shortdesc.ph: Options for handling audio/video stream fallback under poor network conditions.
Options for audio/video stream fallback under poor network conditions.
Options for audio and video stream fallback under poor network conditions.
Options for handling audio/video stream fallback under poor network conditions.

plentry.pd: 0: Do not fallback audio/video streams, but the quality of the streams is not guaranteed.
1: Only receive low-quality video streams (low resolution, low bitrate).

2: Under poor network conditions, first try to receive only low-quality video streams; if video cannot be displayed due to severe network issues, fallback to receiving only the subscribed audio stream.
0: No fallback for audio/video streams, but stream quality is not guaranteed.
1: Only receive the low-quality video stream (low resolution, low bitrate).

2: Under poor network conditions, first try to receive only the low-quality video stream; if the video cannot be displayed due to extremely poor network, fall back to receiving only the subscribed audio stream.
0: Do not fallback for audio and video streams, but the quality of the audio and video streams is not guaranteed.
1: Receive only the low-quality video stream (low resolution and low bitrate).

2: When network conditions are poor, try receiving only the low-quality video stream first; if the video cannot be displayed due to poor network, fallback to receiving only the subscribed audio stream.
0: Do not apply fallback to audio/video streams, but the quality of the streams is not guaranteed.
1: Receive only the low-quality video stream (low resolution, low bitrate).
2: Under poor network conditions, first attempt to receive only the low-quality video stream; if the network is too poor to display video, fallback to receiving only the subscribed audio stream.
